name: San Francisco Pit Stop
description: Since 2014, San Francisco Public Works operates the Pit Stop program with 33 sites in 13 San Francisco neighborhoods for people to take care of their bathroom needs with dignity while keeping neighborhoods clean and safe from human waste, dog waste, and used needles.
fullDescription: Since 2014, San Francisco Public Works operates the Pit Stop program with 33 sites in 13 San Francisco neighborhoods for people to take care of their bathroom needs with dignity while keeping neighborhoods clean and safe from human waste, dog waste, and used needles.
whatTheyOffer: Since 2014, San Francisco Public Works operates the Pit Stop program with 33 sites in 13 San Francisco neighborhoods for people to take care of their bathroom needs with dignity while keeping neighborhoods clean and safe from human waste, dog waste, and used needles.
address: Eddy and Jones streets, San Francisco, CA, 94107
